text: "Fool Again" is a 2000 song by Irish group Westlife and is the fifth and final single from their debut studio album Westlife. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 2 in Ireland and Iceland, number 23 in the Netherlands, number 5 in Sweden, number 6 in Croatia and number 38 in Beligum. ==Track listings== UK CD single # "Fool Again" (2000 remix) # "Tunnel of Love" # "Fool Again" (enhanced section) UK cassette single and European CD single # "Fool Again" (2000 remix) # "Tunnel of Love" ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Westlife songs
title: Fool Again
